Package diceTools.function

Class Count

java.lang.Object
diceTools.function.Count
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.function.Function<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,​java.lang.Integer>
public class Count
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Function<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,​java.lang.Integer>
Function to count Integer's in a List. Counting is performed by checking each Integer with a Predicate, and incrementing the count iff it returns true.

Count is a valid argument for DicePoolMap.flatten(Function)

Author:
kieran

      public static Count countVal​(int val)
      Generates a Count which counts the number of Integers in a List which are equal to some value.
      Parameters:
      val - value to check for
      Returns:
      generated Count. Note that the Count does not handle null values in the List
